alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Guadalupe; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 5:14PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Guadalupe, northwestern Wilson and central Bexar Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 513 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over China Grove, or 7 miles south of Randolph AFB, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Schertz, Cibolo, Universal City, Live Oak, Selma, Floresville, San Antonio Int Airport, Stinson Municipal Airport, Randolph AFB, Kirby, Alamo Heights, Windcrest, Terrell Hills, Hollywood Park, Olmos Park, St. Hedwig, Elmendorf, La Vernia and China Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
